Dictionary.Name: The Free On-line Dictionary of Computing (27 SEP 03)

Definition.WordDefinition:
Joyce
A distributed language based on {Pascal} and {CSP}, by Per Brinch Hansen.
["Joyce - A Programming Language for Distributed Systems", Per Brinch Hansen, Soft Prac & Exp 17(1):29-50 (Jan 1987)].
(1994-12-06)
Joyce n : influential Irish writer noted for his many innovations (such as stream of consciousness writing) (1882-1941) [syn: {James Joyce}, {James Augustine Aloysius Joyce}]
